articles.author: NBC 5 Staff
articles.title: Daylight Saving Time Begins Sunday. When to Set Your Clock Forward, How to Prepare and More - NBC Chicago
articles.description: Most Americans, including Illinois residents, will shift their clocks ahead by an hour this weekend, signaling warmer temperatures and brighter days ahead.
articles.content:
Most Americans, including Illinois residents, will shift their clocks ahead by an hour this weekend, signaling warmer temperatures and brighter days ahead.
